name: preservative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a substance used to prevent decay in wood: a timber/wood preservative The fence has been treated with preservative.
[ C ] a chemical used to stop food from decaying: This bread is completely free from artificial preservatives. No added preservatives. natural preservatives

a substance that treats food in a particular way so it can be kept for a long time without going bad: [ C ] artificial/natural preservatives
